name: Healthcare Club
description:
Healthcare Club an der Universität St. Gallen.

Schlagwörter wie "Digital Health", "Medtech“ oder „Spitalmanagement“ hörst Du in letzter Zeit immer öfter, weißt aber nicht so wirklich, was darunter zu verstehen ist? Oder bist Du bereits bestens informiert, Du weißt aber noch nicht so wirklich wie Du Zugang zu weiterem Wissen bekommen sollst? Durch exklusive Einblicke in den Gesundheitsbereich soll den Mitgliedern ermöglicht werden, wertvolles Wissen und Erfahrungen aus erster Hand zu erhalten.

name: Cycling Club
description: Cycling Club at the HSG

name: Elevated Psychology Network
description:
A global movement to bring awareness and facilitate conversations in the area of psychology, starting at the University of St.Gallen.

The Elevated Psychology Network is a student-driven, non-profit movement founded to provide the necessary tools for Gen Z and Millenials to enhance their mental well-being, open conversations in other mindset, productivity or psychology-related topics. Recent events have emphasized the significance of the club.

Out of St.Gallen, we are committed to facilitating a dialogue with young fellows and current thought leaders in the industry to not only create an impact on a regional, but also international level with the goal to democratize accessibility to psychology knowledge.

name: Philosophy Club
description: The purpose of the club is to allow students to gather and discuss philosophical themes and ideas, share opinions and broaden horizons.

name: Radio toxic.fm
description: Statuten der RSS AG

name: Pride Month
description: Pride Month 2022 is a student initiative supported by the University of St.Gallen, the city, and the canton of St.Gallen. Our events take place in October each year. All of our events are free, you only need to register on our website to attend them. Our aim is to promote inclusion, diversity, and tolerance.

name: HSG Student Podcast
description: Im HSG Student Podcast geht Host Oli auf die Jagd nach den kreativen, unternehmerischen und inspirierenden Persönlichkeiten unseres HSG Campus. Der Podcast ist auf Spotify, Apple Podcast und Co. fast überall jederzeit empfangbar. Hinweise und Feedback zum Format und den Gästen ist jederzeit herzlich willkommen und gewünscht.

name: SGFER
description: Periodical publishing of articles written by students about Global Markets, M&A, Private Equity and Macroeconomics

name: SQUARE
description:
SQUARE is an experimentation field and an open space for dialog and critical debate that helps shape the future of learning at the University of St.Gallen. We invite visitors to find new paths and do things differently. We connect students, faculty, alumni and the public alike in participatory and experiential learning. The space, programme and community are co-created by a team of professionals, students and volunteers.
Stay tuned for upcoming events and opportunities to get involved in a wide breadth of topics.

name: HSG Alumni
description: HSG Alumni ist die Ehemaligen-Organisation der Universität St.Gallen. Mit rund 33'000 Mitgliedern zählen wir zu den bedeutendsten und aktivsten Alumni-Vereinigungen Europas. Mit uns bleibst du in Verbindung mit deinen Studienfreunden, knüpfst neue Kontakte und kannst von einem Angebot an über 350 interessanten Veranstaltungen pro Jahr – auch online – sowie weiteren tollen Services profitieren.

name: HSG Coaching-Programm
description:
Das Coaching-Programm der Universität St.Gallen ist ein auf Persönlichkeitsentwicklung ausgerichtetes, fakultatives Zusatzangebot für Studierende im Assessmentjahr und ohne Einfluss auf Notengebung und Bestehen des Assessmentjahrs. Teilnehmende werden ein Jahr lang von einem oder einer erfahrenen Coach:in begleitet und können zusätzlich an ausgewählten Seminaren teilnehmen, in denen ihre persönliche Entwicklung entlang der vier Kernkompetenzen Selbstreflexion, Selbstverantwortung, Sozialkompetenz und Führungsfähigkeit gezielt gefördert wird. 
The Coaching Programme of the University of St.Gallen is an optional additional service focused on personal development for students in the Assessment Year without any influence on grades. Participants are supported by an experienced coach for one year and have the opportunity to attend selected seminars aimed at developing the four core interdisciplinary skills of self-reflection, personal responsibility, social competence and leadership ability.

name: HSG Mentoring-Programme
description: The HSG Mentoring Programme promotes Bachelor, Master and PhD students in their personal development and professional growth. The HSG provides a suitable framework for the mentoring through connecting experienced HSG alumni (mentors) with students (mentees), and providing advisory services to all involved. Mentors from a variety of fields who are interested in the development of young people accompany students over a period of two years

name: BookCycle
description:
BookCycle St. Gallen is a student initiative at the University of St.Gallen (HSG) in Switzerland. 

Founded in 2021, the initiative aims to promote a culture of recycling and to improve the quality of education in Africa by giving used educational materials a second life.

name: Automobility Club
description: The Automobility Club promotes the exchange between students interested in the mobility industry. We act as the stepstone towards a future career in this sector and provide events with faculty members and companies. Besides our regular public viewing of motorsport events and other leisure events, we also provide further training on the mobility topic i.e. workshops.

name: 125 Jahre HSG
description: The University of St.Gallen celebrates its 125th anniversary in 2023. On this channel you will find all information about upcoming events in this context.

name: Crypto Society of St.Gallen
description: The Crypto Society is the number one address for crypto enthusiastic students in St. Gallen! Join up to meet like–minded people, deepen your knowledge about crypto and emerge in this world-changing industry! In weekly meetings, and regular events with bigger companies and startups, you may learn plenty about the future of the blockchain and crypto technology. The Crypto Society will connect you perfectly with the industry, and serve as your starting point for a future in the future of finance! Also of course, never forget to miss out on our social events of the great crypto community!

name: Studententheater St. Gallen
description: Der Theaterverein an der Universität St.Gallen führt jährlich zwei innovative und aussergewöhnliche Stücke auf.

name: R User Group at the University of St.Gallen
description: R User Group at the University of St. Gallen aims at the further education of students and interested parties in the fields of Data Science and Machine Learning with a special focus on the practical application of the R programming language. We combine a practice-oriented set of events and activities consisting of tutoring and teaching, coding challenges, speaker events, and company events to communicate, learn, and apply coding in a practical context.

name: Safe Space Association
description:
Welcome to Safe Space! 
We on the board know from our own experience how challenging but also enriching studying with a chronic illness/disability can be. Therefore, we founded the association "Safe Space" to provide peer support regarding topics related to (dis)ability and studying. Primarily, we want to network people registered at the Special Needs office, get to know each other and just have a good time. At a joint barbecue or pizza evenings in the last semesters we could experience how enriching, strengthening and cheerful such an exchange can be. So what exactly is the "Safe Space"? First of all: a platform for exchange for university members of the University of St.Gallen. There we provide knowledge on the following topics: mental health and mindfulness, special needs in university and professional life, self-awareness and dealing with strengths and weaknesses, diversity, inclusion & empowerment. The association is intended to serve as a place of experience to reinforce a positive connotation with above mentioned topics and to provide peer support. In this way, it contributes to destigmatization. We are supported organizationally and financially by the Special Needs Office.

name: Corporate Law Club (CLC)
description: Der Verein bezweckt die Förderung von Transparenz und Chancengleichheit im Bereich Corporate Law sowie verwandten Gebieten des Wirtschaftsrechts. Er richtet sich primär an UNISG-Studierende in Law, Law & Economics, als auch International Law. Zu diesem Zweck generiert der Verein relevante praxisbezogene Informationen und macht diese frei zugänglich. Der Verein erstellt z.B. Beiträge zu Themen wie Studium, Karriereplanung oder Berufseinstieg. Diese Inhalte werden von den Vereinsmitgliedern selbst produziert oder entstehen im Gespräch mit Experten, welche von ihren Erfahrungen berichten und Praxiseinblicke teilen. Die Inhalte nehmen die Form von Podcasts oder Blog-Posts an und werden auf der Website des Vereins veröffentlicht. Bei Bedarf kann der Verein auch physische Events durchführen.

name: Rethinking Economics St.Gallen
description:
As a member of Rethinking Economics International, RE St. Gallen is actively aiming to challenge and transform the way economics is taught, researched, and applied.

We have two main focus points: first, advocating for a more pluralistic approach to economics that recognises the limits and assumptions of traditional neoclassical economics. We spotlight elements of other schools of thought such as Post-Keynesian, Marxian, Austrian, or Feminist Economics. Second, we want to put economics into context by incorporating insights from other disciplines such as anthropology, psychology, sociology, ecology, as well as cultural studies.

Through organising events and workshops, we try to create a platform for critical thinking and dialogue among students, academics, and practitioners of economics. We strongly believe that this more diverse and interdisciplinary approach to economics is necessary to address the complex challenges of the 21st century, such as inequality, climate change, and financial instability.

name: MSASG (Muslim Students Association St. Gallen)
description:
The core idea of MSASG is to bring together students interested in Islam and like-minded individuals to build a strong religious community and connect during religious holidays. We aim to have meaningful conversations about our religious identities, traditions, and practices. Our 
initiative creates a space where we respect and trust each other. We also explore economic, 
scientific, and social topics from an Islamic  perspective, aiming to offer insights based on our faith's principles and values. MSASG is not the ultimate source of Islamic knowledge; the goal is to support students in their academic and spiritual learning journey.

name: Students' Philanthropic Foundation
description:
We are the St.Gallen branch of the Students' Philanthropic Foundation (SPF). The Students' Philanthropic Foundation is a registered non-profit that acts on a global scale to support children in South America and Asia. 
Our vision is to drastically reduce extreme poverty and hardship in the regions we support. We recognize that education is the key determinant of economic prosperity and hope to act as a catalyst for the continuous improvement of quality of life and human development. 
Throughout the semester, we organize a variety of events that generate funds to support our current aid projects. With branches spanning across prestigious institutions such as Columbia University, Universita Bocconi, ESADE, and the Copenhagen Business School, we are proud to contribute to this impactful network. 
Our mission is simple yet powerful: we aim to involve as many students as possible in philanthropic work, channeling the expertise, creativity, and effort of a diverse and motivated group of individuals to create long-term impact around the globe.
Join us in making a meaningful impact on the world!

name: Militärische Verbindungsstelle (MilVrb HSG)
description:
Die Militärische Verbindungsstelle berät Studierende mit dem Ziel, den Studienalltag sowie die Militär- sowie Zivildienstpflicht unter einen Hut zu bekommen.
_The Military Liaison Office advises students with the aim of managing the daily routine of their studies as well as their military and civilian service obligations._

name: Appenzeller Verein
description: Der Verein bezweckt die Förderung von Kontakten zwischen Appenzeller HSG Studiereden, Appenzeller HSG Alumni und Studierende die generell an Appenzell interessiert sind.

social.instagram: Appenzeller Verein von Studierenden der HSG (@appenzeller_verein) • Instagram photos and videos
social.linkedin: Appenzeller Verein at the University of St. Gallen: Overview | LinkedIn

name: ETHSG
description: With the aim of bringing together students of ETH Zurich and HSG (Hochschule St. Gallen), we organise various events like discussions, workshops, company visits and many socializing events. We encourage the exchange of knowledge and skills between students of different study programmes and promote interdisciplinarity with our network.

name: Conscious Cooking Advent Calendar
description: As part of the *Sustainability Team at SHSG* in cooperation with the course *“Nachhaltige Start-Ups”*, we have set ourselves the goal of introducing students to a *balanced and healthy diet* in the form of an advent calendar. *Inspiring new recipes* and *interesting facts* about *four different themes* (e.g. a diet that maximizes your learning performance) await you for the next 24 days. You can also check out SHSG's Instagram channel *@studentenschaft* to make sure you don't miss any posts. Additionally, catch us *every Monday at our booth* in the library building for more tips and inspiration. *#SHSGConsiousCookingAdventCalendar* 🌱🍽️

name: Akademikerhaus
description:
"Horizonte erweitern" ist das Motto des Akademikerhauses (Dufourstrasse 87). 
Seit 1963 bieten wir ein abwechslungsreiches Programm von Events an. Traditionellerweise prägen wertvolle Begegnungen mit Persönlichkeiten aus verschiedenen gesellschaftlichen Bereichen sowie der engagierte Austausch in der Diskussion den besonderen Charakter unseres Hauses. Das Akademikerhaus ist als Angebot der katholischen Universitätsseelsorge für alle da, egal, welcher Konfession, Religion und Nation man angehört.

"Broadening horizons" is the motto of the Akademikerhaus (Dufourstrasse 87). 
We have been offering a varied programme of events since 1963. Traditionally, valuable encounters with personalities from different areas of society as well as committed exchange in discussion shape the special character of our house. As an offer of the Catholic university chaplaincy, the Akademikerhaus is there for everyone, no matter what denomination, religion or nation one belongs to.

name: Aargauer Verein
description: Der Aargauer Verein der HSG: Gemeinsam feiern wir mitreissende Partys, treffen uns zum lockeren Austausch und besuchen Unternehmen aus verschiedenen Branchen im Kanton Aargau.

name: Athletes Club
description: The Athletes Club at the University of St. Gallen is a community of active and former athletes. We connect students who have played sport at a high level with each other and with representatives from the business world.
